comments.raw_text:
Due to bug 652494, test_resizer.xul should be failing due to an caught JS exception:

uncaught exception: [Exception... "Component returned failure code: 0x80004005 (NS_ERROR_FAILURE) [nsIDOMWindowUtils.sendMouseEvent]"  nsresult: "0x80004005 (NS_ERROR_FAILURE)"  location: "JS frame :: chrome://mochikit/content/tests/SimpleTest/EventUtils.js :: synthesizeMouse :: line 228"  data: no] at :0
